sen.j: 藤原秀郷・藤原兼行の孫で、足利氏 (藤原氏)の祖・足利成行の嫡子。
sen.e: He was a grandson of FUJIWARA no Hidesato and FUJIWARA no Kaneyuki, and a legitimate child of Nariyuki ASHIKAGA, the founder of the Ashikaga clan (the Fujiwara clan).

sen.j: ただ、父の成行が亡くなると、一族から養子の足利家綱を迎えて、その後を継いだと、記録に認（したた）めてあることから、父より先立って早世したと思われる。
sen.e: However, there is a record that after Naritsuna's father Nariyuki died, Ietsuna ASHIKAGA was adopted from the same clan and succeeded to Nariyuki's position, so it is considered that Naritsuna had died before his father's death.

sen.j: なお、彼の娘は河内源氏の源義国の側室となり、源義重（上野源氏祖）を産んだという。
